channel.title: CVE Feed for KINGSOFT JAPAN, INC. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KINGSOFT JAPAN, INC. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25969|2024-08-03T04:56:36.775Z -- kingsoft%20japan%2C%20inc. -- the%20installer%20of%20wps%20office
item.description: The installer of WPS Office Version 10.8.0.6186 insecurely load VERSION.DLL (or some other DLLs), allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privilege of the user invoking the installer.

item.title: CVE-2022-26081|2024-08-03T04:56:37.604Z -- kingsoft%20japan%2C%20inc. -- the%20installer%20of%20wps%20office
item.description: The installer of WPS Office Version 10.8.0.5745 insecurely load shcore.dll, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privilege of the user invoking the installer.

item.title: CVE-2022-25949|2024-08-03T04:56:36.510Z -- kingsoft%20japan%2C%20inc. -- kingsoft%20internet%20security%209%20plus
item.description: The kernel mode driver kwatch3 of KINGSOFT Internet Security 9 Plus Version 2010.06.23.247 fails to properly handle crafted inputs, leading to stack-based buffer overflow.
